website_summaries.verdict: An amazing number of versatile tools for a price that is surprisingly low considering all you get – 12 snap ring pliers in a durable case that have a lot to offer in the way of value.
pros: A large set packed with the most popular sizes
The rugged case has individual slots to keep the tools organized
cons: Some reports of issues with the tips, including bends and misalignments

customer_reviews.title: Stamped steel that will bend under load.
customer_reviews.text: OK for light use. The description led me to believe these were professional duty tools. The are not. They are stamped steel. They are not up to use for automotive applications. The tips bent the first time a used it. I fell for quantity over quality.
customer_reviews.author: dxpope

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy construction
customer_reviews.text: For a tool that demands a relatively high degree of precision, these snap-ring pliers aren't even close. They are stamped steel construction with no attention to detail regarding pin alignment or positioning. They are quite possibly the worst tools I have ever purchased from Amazon, and they are "Amazon's Choice?" That recommendation now means exactly nothing.
customer_reviews.author: malthous

customer_reviews.title: For specialty tools I usually try to always buy Lang tools because i think they are great quality tools
customer_reviews.text: I run a part time autorepair shop and I was constantly going thru tips with my snap ring pliers. Or i wouldn't have 1 big enough or small enough or going in the right direction. Well this takes care of just about everything u need! They are reversible and so far VERY durable. Snap rings on press in hub bearings..Nooooo problem! And much more. For specialty tools I usually try to always buy Lang tools because i think they are great quality tools.
customer_reviews.author: John m

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect set of snap ring pliers and better quality I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect set of snap ring pliers and better quality I could find around here within a 60 mile radius. I couldn't even find the proper size that I needed around here. So when all else fails I get on amazon to see what I can find and I was not disappointed. I would definitely purchase this set again if I needed.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Hello Fixed Tips
customer_reviews.text: This was even better than what I expected. I work on a lot of equipment and did not have much success with the model that have interchangeable tips, they would fall out or bend. This set went right to work as soon as it arrived. Removed and installed some 3" internal snap rings inside a gearbox housing on the first try. Nice having a case that puts them in plain sight so you can pick the one you need and keep them all together.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Behrens

customer_reviews.title: Good for money
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I love the forged knipex but too expensive for a full set. These work well, way better than the replaceable tips kind (which don't work at all as I'm sure everyone knows.) The reversing mechanism works OK for me. Pros for whom every second counts may demur. I've only used one so far but usability is close to comparable to my dedicated Knipex and way cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Willie the Shake

customer_reviews.title: The tip of the plier bent after first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of pliers after reading all of the reviews to grease my lawn mower wheels but the first time using it the tip of the plier bent on me rendering it useless. Why is it so weak? The snap ring was a very small one too?
customer_reviews.author: kennyvd

customer_reviews.title: Great value, quality is spot on.
customer_reviews.text: I was told that Snap on has purchased Lang. If so, Snap on will inflate price considerably.. tis is a very nice set at a realistic price. Great value in my opinion. I recently used thevlage pairbto remove a large snap ring from wheel bearing hub. This was an easy job, thetips held on well to ring. I should probably purchase another set. Great product without killing your bank account.
customer_reviews.author: tony corgliano

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Snap Ring Plier Value
customer_reviews.text: These Snap ring pliers are a great value for the money. Not only are they made in USA but they're affordable as well. These are perfect for the DIY. If you plan on using a set everyday in a professional environment i would recommend the SK brand set (~$300). I prefer this reversible design to the knipex one size one type design as i have all the sizes i need for internal and external rings at a much more affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set with everything you'll ever need for snap ring pliers lots of sizes and switch from inner or outer positioning easy and fast enough for me to get any job done and much more affordable than the big Ames that rebrand them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Iffy tips
customer_reviews.text: Seem good for the money, the slightly angled tips are actually clutch in my opinion. Only gripe is quality, smallest one (Id least if ever use) somehow made it through to me the customer with half a tip and a few others are slightly deformed, not to the point they won’t get ya by though. Either way I’ve used co workers Lang sets before and they’ll do the job. Just disappointed in some of the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Best retaining ring pliers money can buy
customer_reviews.text: Being a mechanic by trade, having good quality tools is very important. I was looking to replace some tools that were stolen and I was recommended this brand of retaining ring pliers by a coworker. I'm very happy with my purchase, this kit has everything I need, very good quality tools at a fraction of the cost of the typical big name brands.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo V.

customer_reviews.title: They are not the best quality but worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I picked out needed thread chasing in order to convert from inside to outside. I also noticed I needed to bend the ends slightly to align the tips. However the fit in the hand nicely, the tips themselves are a good match in size and I would buy them again. I dont keep mine in the cases they come in and this case isn't very good ( they don't stay in there perspective place when closed).
customer_reviews.author: Brian W

customer_reviews.title: Quality product with carry case
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of have these because I don't have to change out tips plus they stay on and spread snap rings all the way to get them off, If you've work around larger snap rings you know what in mean. Nice carry case fits nice in tool box professional. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Diamonddave

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Set of Snap Ring Pliers
customer_reviews.text: Nothing here not to like. This set contains all of the sizes you need to remove and install small and large internal/external snap rings. This is an extremely well made set of snap ring pliers. You won't be disappointed. The plastic case to keep them in order is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen F Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Good tool.bad design
customer_reviews.text: I just got this set.at first looks great and of a good quality.but you will need bith hands to operated them.you suppose to squezee them to open the ring.no.this one you have to pull out ward to open the ring.maybe will work on fixed parts .but if you have a part that needs to be hold in hand.make sure you have a vise close by.you will needed..I will return them..
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: Better than many
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they cost more but seem to be better made than my past set. Not something I use everyday. When you nee a tool to repair something it needs to be reliable. I never know what size I'll need next and this set should meet most of my requirements..
customer_reviews.author: Larry K. Schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Quality tools from Lang as usual. This is the same set they sell to snap on for them to just put the snap on name on the grips and charge a ridiculous price. And made in USA. Tool salesmen are gonna be extinct soon cause of Amazon lol
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cartelli

customer_reviews.title: the right tool for the job...
customer_reviews.text: You need the right tool for the job. Ever try to remove a snap ring with a pocket knife, or an ice pick, or a pair of ice picks? That is the act of a desperate man. Do yourself a favor, get a set of these. Multiple sizes, can be reversed to do either interior or exterior snap rings. Fantastic price, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Hill

customer_reviews.title: Better than the tool truck brands.
customer_reviews.text: I have used all the snap ring pliers from all the tool trucks and this set beats them all easily. Quality build material, tips have been holding strong with no distortion after very regular use. Minimal flex at joint when opening heavy external rings.
customer_reviews.author: E.Mess

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Only used one of the largest. Worked flawlessly. Only grip so far is the case, if you change them to external configuration, they don't store in the case. Kinda sucks if you have a limited set of applications to be changing twice each use.
customer_reviews.author: /Dev/Null

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Snap ring pliers were a lifesaver!!...dont buy a cheap set..., get these and u will be happy
customer_reviews.author: Gearhead3000

customer_reviews.title: No more struggling with needle-nose pliers
customer_reviews.text: Can you technically survive without this set by using needle nose pliers? Probably. Should you suffer needlessly? No. I with I had bought this set years ago -- every single snap ring is effortlessly removed and installed. The set has surpassed expectations and is also made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Berg

customer_reviews.title: Not useful in tight spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of snap ring pliers but they are too fat at the hinge making them useless in tight areas. Kind of disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't expecting to take them apart to switch from inside to outside
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting to have to take them apart to switch from inside to outside. Great selection of points though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They come in a nice plastic case and have a oil residue to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: These are not a Snap-on or a Matco set, but they get the job done without breaking. They come in a nice plastic case and have a oil residue to keep them form rusting. I needed them for a job right away and they worked and did not break. Usually inexpensive snap ring sets break at the first or second use. Only the long run will tell if these get to a number 5.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: I dont believe you can beat this set for the price. They are usa made and of fantastic quality.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: A thrifty person doesn't buy cheap tools.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a set of snap ring pliers that will last a lifetime, spend the money now on a USA made, quality tool. Less $$ than the tool truck, I guarantee it, but still high quality. I've used them a few times and they're smooth and grab big snap rings well. I only wish I could use them more often!
customer_reviews.author: B. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: I use the quite often in diesel truck repair and maintenance, works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: They work good. You get what you pay for. For the money they are great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: These work great for removing snap rings and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's an okay set
customer_reviews.text: If it didn't have so many sets I would say it wasn't a good buy. Difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Justin King

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set to have
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set to have, had the set on a fender doing my job and had quite a few other mechanics throughout the day asking me where I got the set, plus saved almost $300 from not getting it off the Mac truck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Only about $20 more the the hf set and in my opinion it’s more the worth the extra $$$

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good buy, the switching the pliers from open to close is rough I dont think the screw threads were done well enough.

customer_reviews.title: Portable carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Product is very strong and works great. Best thing about this product is that it is still made in the USA

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Best set I have owned, going on 5 years now
customer_reviews.author: bking

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Used daily in my trade. Just as well made and dependable as higher priced competitors. Very impressed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good price. Timely delivery... would definitely do repeat business.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have worked well thus far, no sign of excessive wear on the tips.
customer_reviews.author: the lone haranguer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great strong. Carrying case holds everything nice and secure. Not cheap but well worth the price. Lang tools is the same as kastar just new name.
customer_reviews.author: Mec. Noman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tools.
customer_reviews.text: Why buy Mac or Snap-on when they buy from this company and put their logo and paint job on it. They work excellent. I probably have 20-30,000 in snap-on tools so I know what I'm talking about!
customer_reviews.author: J. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Do the job but not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: They work no worries, some of them are poorly manufactured with prongs pointing at different angles etc. Worried they will snap! Worth the money though considering how many you get
customer_reviews.author: Steven H.

customer_reviews.title: Universal Kit for most snap rings
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a quality tool kit designed for years of use. Obviously designed for the person who uses or works on equipment with snap rings frequently.
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I do not like about this set is that the case does not have a handle. However that’s not a big deal cause you don’t necessarily have to take the whole case with you. The tool itself is very well made and have no complaints about the tool what so ever. I highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: doug massey

customer_reviews.title: The tips were fine! I've had cheaper ones bend instantly
customer_reviews.text: I put a lot of pressure on the big guys with a MASSIVE internal circlip on my Vette's torque tube. The tips were fine! I've had cheaper ones bend instantly. These pliers feel quite nice in the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Hans K.

customer_reviews.title: and Snap on versions of these and have paid three times for a set just like this and the lang set works just as well
customer_reviews.text: I'm a forklift mechanic for Crown lift trucks. I use these things constantly, and they have not let me down. I have buddies that have the Matco, Cornwell, and Snap on versions of these and have paid three times for a set just like this and the lang set works just as well. Very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Missing pliers
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set. However I received two of the same 45 degree angle pliers part number 3490. I didn’t receive the number 3491 ninety degree angle pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: American Made!
customer_reviews.text: American made, high quality, complete set, at a great price. I have used them a few times, and I am not disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Great set.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy

customer_reviews.text: The tools are high quality and are what I expected. I would like to know why the bag was open and the security zip tie cut off the case, tools were laying loose inside the case...its obvious it was intentionally opened.

customer_reviews.title: Good

customer_reviews.text: Comfortable grips, nice points and the quality is as good as other snap ring pliers that I own that cost much more. Unable to comment on durability but I suspect they will last a long time.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, very pleased

Apparently Lang Tools has no quality control dept or disgruntled employees that are damaging the tools. I won't be buying any more of their products.Junk!!! Photo shows an unused tool. That's straight out of the package.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great set
customer_reviews.text: I always try to write at least one good thing and one bad thing about each tool I review. In this case, the only 'improvement' I can make is to give it a more comfortable handle, but these already have rather comfortable handles and putting a thicker rubber on the handle will only take up more toolbox space, so I'm happy. Otherwise, this set hits just about every snap ring (internal and external) you'll see. I think this is some of my best spent money as of late.

customer_reviews.text: Really nice set of tools, quality made. Turned a previous 15 minute process into a 2 minute one. Would definitely buy Lang tools again. I really like having the 3 separate heads for each tool size, so well worth the price.

product_meta.title: Lang Tools (3495) 12-Piece Fixed Tip Combination Internal/External Snap Ring Pliers Set
product_meta.description: Lang Tools model 3495 12 piece combination internal/external snap ring pliers is one of the most versatile set of pliers on the market. These heavy-duty, fixed-tip snap ring pliers assist you in removing or installing internal or external snap rings on a wide variety of applications. Each pliers has a center screw and spring washer which allows for easy convertibility for internal and external ring applications while providing a strong and secure hold in use. The 3495 set features four popular sizes- 0. 038", 0. 047", 0. 070", and 0. 090"- in straight, 45-degree, and 90-degree tip angles.
feature_bullets: Pliers have a knurled center screw with spring for easy changing and a secure hold
Features 0. 038", 0. 047", 0. 070", 0. 090" tip diameters in straight, 45-degree and 90-degree angles
Comfort grip made of low-temp, high-impact material providing extra durability
Packaged in a plastic blow molded case for protection and easy use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars409 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
